meanings.definition: Bought in excessive quantities or at excessively high prices.
meanings.sent1: The store was overbought with expensive designer clothes.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had overbought groceries and had to return some.
meanings.sent3: He felt overbought with toys after his birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The market was overbought with eager investors.
meanings.sent5: The room looked overbought with too many decorations.

meanings.definition: Past tense of buy too much or too expensively.
meanings.sent1: They overbought the limited edition sneakers.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, she overbought snacks for the movie night.
meanings.sent3: He overbought so many books that his shelves were overflowing.
meanings.sent4: The company overbought supplies and had to store them in the garage.
meanings.sent5: The team overbought equipment for the project, causing budget issues.
